Actor Specs¶

Tags Which Can Be Used In Actorspec¶

On Actor Level¶

Tasklets¶

if we use tasklets or not tasklets

noremote¶

if the actor is remotely accessible or not, if noremote then no rest webservices or other remoting noremote

nomodel¶

models will not be connected to actor even if specified nomodel

On Method Level¶

|@noauth | means there will be authentication required| |@returnformat | how will we transform the output of the method tasklet possibilities: raw (std is json, so not to be specified)|
